hooks.command: file_path=$(cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty'); if [ -n "$file_path" ] && [ -f .breadcrumbs.json ]; then result=$(breadcrumb check "$file_path" 2>/dev/null); notes=$(echo "$result" | jq -r 'if .breadcrumbs and (.breadcrumbs | length) > 0 then "ğŸ“ NOTES: " + (.breadcrumbs | map(.message) | join("; ")) else empty end'); [ -n "$notes" ] && echo "$notes"; fi; exit 0
